subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|愛%猫|あい%びょう}}: [[beloved]] [[cat]]; [[love]] for [[cats]]
* {{ja-r|怪%猫|かい%びょう}}: a [[monster]] [[cat]]
* {{ja-r|成%猫|せい%びょう}}: [[fully]]-[[grown]] [[cat]]
* {{ja-r|斑%猫|はん%みょう}}: [[tiger beetle]]
* {{ja-r|猫%額|びょう%がく}}: [[cat]]'s [[forehead]], [[smallness]] as that of a cat's forehead
* {{ja-r|猫%睛%石|びょう%せい%せき}}: [[cat's-eye]]
* {{ja-r|霊%猫|れい%びょう}}: [[civet]]
{{der-bottom}}
